mapper.insert: insert into CRM_ORDER_DLJZ_DETAIL (EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, IS_BEGIN,DIFF) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diff,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select EVENT_ID, ORDER_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, IS_BEGIN,DIFF from CRM_ORDER_DLJZ_DETAIL
